name: Unpire Bloodbank
description:
Unpire Bloodbath is a game where you play as an Unpire- you're like a vampire, but instead of cool superpowers, you're just allergic to blood.

Normally, not a huge deal. Unfortunately for you, you work at a bloodbank in Vamp City

Delve into the "Heart Vault" of the bank to grab withdrawals, all without getting a single drop of blood on you!
